**Farewell, Sofie! ☕🧶**

After six incredible months, it’s time to say goodbye to our very own human espresso machine and master yarn untangler — **Sofie**!

From keeping the team powered through countless coffee runs to untangling more yarn (metaphorical or otherwise) than any mortal should be expected to handle, Sofie has brought energy, creativity, and a whole lot of calm to our chaos.

She’s not just left a mark on our projects — she’s left a mark on our hearts. Whether it was her quick wit, her problem-solving superpowers, or her ability to turn even the most tangled situations into smooth sailing, we’re so grateful for the time she’s spent with us.

Sofie, as you move on to your next adventure, know that you’ve made a real difference here. We’ll miss your smile, your coffee game, and your legendary yarn management skills.

All the best in your future endeavors — and don’t forget to keep the world caffeinated and untangled!

With gratitude and a touch of bittersweetness,  
[Your Team Name]
